Best Drill seasons to LOWER stats?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Monster Rancher DS: General QA: Best Drill seasons to LOWER stats?
By Zekira G. Drake on Thursday, September 16, 2010 - 08:11 pm:

I'm raising my first overdrive monster now and I realized my Int is way too high, around 300 high points too high even (combination, go figure). And I think the most practical way to reduce stats is to grind the stat-downs in Drills. Looking at the maps, I'm not sure which seasons actually look best for stat-downing, because obviously that's not the practical use of Drilling, but maybe, just maybe someone here has an idea?

By Zekira G. Drake on Friday, September 17, 2010 - 08:38 pm:

Derp, never mind...

It seems that after maxing your monster, any attempts to lower stats will result in them only lowering by 1, so in effect for each StatDown panel in a Drill, you only get a -2 in total stats :/

I accidentally maxxed out my overdrive Snowball and it has too much Int and Lif, wasting around 500 points supposedly to be distributed between Pow and Ski :/
